description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionDateTime_End.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the end of the drive session event.

ServiceHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime asset usage meter that the asset is serviced against.

EngineRunTimeMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of time asset has had its engine running.

HydraulicHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of asset's hydraulics usage.

TractionHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of asset's drive motor usage.

Odometer.description: Units: Metres. Sum of distance asset has traveled over it's lifetime.

MonitoredDurationHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Sum of asset service hours that the telemetry module has spent monitoring asset.

ContainerCount.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime.

LadenHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent laden (carrying a load) over its lifetime.

UnladenHourMeter.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent on but unladen over its lifetime.

FuelUsedMeter.description: Units: 0.5 Litres. Sum of amount of fuel asset has consumed over its lifetime.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
